sentences.sContent: We’ll save a lot of time if we go by car.
sentences.sCn: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.sContent: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.sCn: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

sentences.sContent: ways to save money on heating bills
sentences.sCn: 节省取暖费的种种办法

sentences.sContent: ...The Shoppers in the UK are spending less money on toilet paper to save money...

...leslie writes: google aims to save you from the thirst of curiosity altogether...
...you’ll save yourself time when you find a job that leaves you with enough time to get your school work done...

...What measure has been planned to save costs...
...a move he says could save $3 billion annually...
...What does the speaker suggest people do to save housing expenses...
...many others eat at home more frequently to save money...
...to save another hundred dollars or so...
...Many people eat out less often to save money in times of recession...
...but you can take a bus from Vancouver back to Bellingham and still save money...
...Grand to discuss ways in which we could help TGC protect itself from such problems and save money at the same time...
...you should be able to save $89 over the one-way fare...
...many customers turned to fast food to save money...
...it’s often easier to save on essentials than on enjoyable extras...
...save for a single word added in the margin of the final page : Flawless...
...And to save money and still eat well you don't need local...
...To eat well and still save money...
...but I wouldn't expect them to save to buy their own socks...
...you just need to review your marks and you can save a lot of time...

...Avoiding over-consumption of sugar can improve people's health as well as save medical expenses...

...save more money — have already fallen by the wayside...
...But there is also pressure to buy local and save on food miles...
...They'll say it's to save to spend...

...Some people want to make and save a lot of money in order to retire early...
